header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Day trip to a farm, eating, childrenâ€™s behaviour at school
header.activity: Family talking about farm visit that day, behaviour at school, DVDs

body.u: so what was the best bit about today?
why did you like seeing the piglets?
because they were they all all fully round and they were sneaking each in ddifferent pigsties
and what was the area that's that they keep the pigs that's called? what's it called? can you remember?
the piggery you thought that was a funny word didn't you?
sounds like something a minion would say piggery
well why don't you talk first cos has got food?
were squeezing through little gaps in the er walls that separated the different pigs
and then they all got into one and they started sniffing around for food
but only one pig stayed behind
and that one was a sheep
ah and they were very noisy at meal time weren't they?
oh mum remember when we saw the little piglets asleep in their little beds?
they were so cute they were going
they were very sweet weren't they? and they had yes it was like a little incubator it was keeping them nice and snuggly-buggly nice and warm
and they were also preserving body heat by snuggling up with each other
will you buy one for me?
well it was like you were being an in an incubator last night because as I said
you were sleeping like the piglets next to each other but you were sleeping underneath the quilt that had so your head was totally underneath the quilt
and I tried to move it a couple of times but you just put it kept putting it back
you were so sweaty and hot
but you're you were lying much lower down than so 's head was quite high up with the quilt and then I was like where's ?
I couldn't find you for ages
do you actually sleep quite well when you're together?
it doesn't look like there's a lot of room I keep meaning to say let's put the other bed out but that takes such a lot of faff can't really be bothered but
are you gonna sleep together tomorrow when is here?
because the reason why we sleep together is because erm sometimes we erm we've seen something which we don't like
and we feel safe with somebody and
we basically seem to always talk for a bit
you chat forever I was like what what do you talk about? that's what I want to know
now we're gonna chat about piglets
mm? and was showing you how to do some doodling as well?
that's pretty cool I mean we were very late last night though
late late I can work late
cos the hoop class went on quite late so you didn't chat too much?
no we only chat for about chatted for about two hours very very small
and what was this problem with this boy at the park at today?
he tried to and er failed to arrest me
but did he just come over and start playing with you guys?
so he had he had got some people to get loads and loads of logs and put them in the one corner and put them
in a corner where they keep the toy tractors
yeah and I was trying to move them because it was a potential hazard because some pleone could slip on them
and I was just moving them
and then they became really angry and started chasing
yeah well they failed in catching me
and a plastic badge and kept saying stuff in the name of the law I just found it a really fun game
but then what were they doing when we went to the woods later?
erm well one boy tripped over
they he put because erm I'll tell you what happened he was taking wood from another game which was not complete to make another game
which obviously you're allowed to do
they said and we said we were stealing wood from our own den
we said we were stealing wood from our f
correction you said you were stealing wood
you said you were stealing wood? what? to them?
f we said we said we were stealing wood from our ffrom our den so we were stealing wood so like got wood from our tree
and then we put it back
well started saying it as well and then
well we just were talking about it but
and then erm one of them said it was dinosaur tooth and said it's not a dinosaur tooth and she went up to show them and then he just then he got an and then he and then he pushed her over
and then I said but you're not allowed to hurt girls and then said yeah and I said but you hurt a girl
and they were like well the boy who pushed over said well she did something to me so I did so I did something to her and he didn't even and didn't even touch him
he did apologise I made him
good for you good for you mum
yeah well you know I like to involve myself in these things do you want some more eggs ?
no? there's loads of scrambled eggs if you want them
do you want some? no? say no
and I was very caring to

cos I asked her what was wrong and she had a little cut and I said come on and I was very angry with the boys because I thought well she didn't even she just said it wasn't a dinosaur and went over and showed them
yes you don't need to push somebody over do you?
and I was like it's so silly
I did tell them it's a log I said that's not a dinosaur tooth that's a stick
and he said yeah but it looks like a dinosaur tooth
well went to the woodlands to avoid them didn't we so?
it was a bit unfortunate that they joined that area
the boys' mums were very very nice
well they were alright they listened to the issues
although I still didn't get a chance to tell to ask the boy's mum how old he was because he said he was seventeen
well I really I am really really worried about the future of boys
you're worried about the future of boys
yeah how immature they're gonna be
well he's obviously got a big imagination hasn't he?
the percentage of the class n of im of mature boys is very very small
erm so it's you ? is mature?
well has got some lovely boys in your class haven't you?
I know who you're thinking about
I'm thinking about but I know won't include he's not mature yet he's just lovely
mum he's not lovely plus you know er
I had an idea er cos we did it cos we did it wrong that everyo so when we were with Miss I'll tell you about this just snatched my hand away
he snatched your hand away from what?
from cos I said we cheated I need to do it in a in the right way we did it so it was
so we were listening to music
I think you've told me this before
take your hand away from your mouth cos I can't hear
and then erm he like said no we couldn't do this idea when it was mine
and we did it wrong and she said we couldn't change it but then they changed it
erm well sometimes can be a bit
but they're sensible mostly aren't they?
you've got some nice boys in your class
sensible boys can but there are boys which are not very sensible like and cos they basically fight
I know but that's not many what did you say ?
you're still worried about the future of boys?
yeah cos that his two years' difference
two years can last a long time
two thousand and fourteen didn't last long though oh wait was that? or was it two thousand and fifteen? oh yeah two thousand and fourteen lasted ages
I think it might have but there was a definitely a year
you mean year two? went slowly but year three went fast?
well it's two thousand and sixteen now
so do you think year three went fast but year two went slowly
erm I think it could've been year two going fast
I think all of the years have gone fast since you t started school to be honest they're we're whizzing by them aren't they?
and soon you'll be like at secondary school weird feel very strange when you're both at secondary school you you'll be able to go to school on your own without me
well I guess we'll we'll we we will be late if we're with you
because you would need to go to work
well I fit in work around you at the moment don't I?
mostly erm but you'll we'll go you if you walk to school you can meet and and
you know all those people and walk to school with them yes and and
oh yeah I can meet up with all oh wait hopefully I'll be able to get to school early
like have enough time well when we're walking to school I'd take a quick
I'd take a quick turn to 's house I'd probably
knock on his door and see if he's there
mm well yeah cos he's right on the way to school isn't he?
yeah so we'll set up so I'll ask his
hang on you wanted me to pass that ? have you got enough now? yep carry on
I'll ask his mum or dad if he's ready for school yet obviously politely
well you'll probably text him before you leave cos you'll all have mobile phones and things won't you?
but it would save phone power
mm so yeah I mean they er you'll you can all walk to school together can't you?
that'll be nice how lucky that we've just got a school that's only down the road
no cos some people have to get the bus for miles don't they?
I think either did or still does live in
no she lives round the corner from us now
she lived in for a long time yeah
he will soon take the bus
will he? do I know ? which er who's ?
he's a boy who cries a lot
in your class? is he new? has he always been there? well who was that? I don't know that person do I?
don't whisper what do you want?
oh that's who he was I just couldn't place who he was
he's gonna they're going to move out from ?
he told you that he was gonna live in New York didn't he? a couple of years ago he makes a lot of things up so I'm not sure if that's true to be honest
he did tell the teacher he was gonna erm go on the bus soon as he's not
but he also told the teacher he was going to New York
can you get me some more water?
mm that was when you were in Mr 's class
Mr I am going to move to i New York
he was al but he told loads of fibs in well it's not fibs at that age but yeah he made a lot of stuff up did he say more about it where he's moving?
I'm going to move move move move
but then somebody in your class said they were doing home school and I don't think they are
I mean her sister is doing home school
no I think she I think she said she was gonna move out after Easter holidays
but did you have a leaving thing for her?
well but you would do wouldn't you?
well if she does then I will definitely not have known for a long time less than a year
did they did they join this year then?
joined in year three but in Mr 's class
so I I knew she was there
although I didn't really know what she was like
i well presumably at the same time as her sister yeah well okay
but h is he is he starting or is he going to be homeschooled as well?
he's starting I dunno if he's gonna be homeschooled

oh cos you know and 's is in erm reception now and then and 's little brother is starting in September which is mad cos I remem when when we moved to this village erm yeah we saw them I saw them get pregnant and have the babies and stuff and now they're going to school yeah
in fact we met 's sorry 's no no no no no yeah and that we met them at playgroup when was two weeks old

and he's he is at reception now isn't it? yes he must be crazy but was it alright having ? it was nice at wasn't it? mm what I meant to say to you was though I was just talking to to having people over for a play date and she says that actually does really struggle having don't scrape that along the table she does struggle to to sort of play with people nicely a in her house erm but with you two she's alright isn't she?
yeah but she can but i sh I think she finds it hard playing here doesn't she?
you can't have any more cos there's only a tiny bit left
bits oh good grief but yeah she's had some really I'm just letting you know that I just think she finds it hard cos she's an only child I think she finds it hard sharing her toys

but I also think she does struggle when she comes here I don't think she knows what to do with herself and I guess she's so used to playing with her mum or playing on on her own I don't think she understands really how to play with other people and I know you've been finding it difficult with her here so I just thought you should know that cos it's it just something that she has with everybody except play dates cos she really likes having you guys over doesn't she?
yeah maybe it's because you're there together and it's almost like y she's a a third sibling
and you're all brothers and sisters together
mm but that's lovely if she can get on with you guys isn't it?
she's amazed by my Lego skills

so is thought that school didn't start until Tuesday so she sent me into a mass panic when she left cos she said oh I said I'll see you on Monday and she said Monday? I said yeah it's school and she said no no it's a training day and I said no it isn't there's a training day at the village college so I'm working I said it's not it's not a training day and I double checked the newsletter and you are going into school on Monday
I know but she booked to send to a holiday erm play scheme for the day so he would've missed his first day at school and he would've been
well they probably wouldn't've been open
well he probably would've preferred it than learning than learning
I know but it's yeah but you don't wanna miss the first day unless you're ill really
are you alright? are you full ?
it's annoying when you're ill and you think
I'm missing school and then you find out that the class did something amazing and you're like
he was off for ages wasn't he?
what did he miss? can you remember?
was it the big sign-up as well? did he miss that?
and he mi he missed bikeability you know the fun one? he missed that one
oh did he? oh that was a shame
yeah but erm well I don't really know if he no that was after well he missed loads of things I think he even missed school trip
I think he probably did miss his school trip I can't remember where you went last where did you go?
we went we went to the church
did you? what were you going to the church for?
we were we were remember when we made the lanterns?
u you mean ? cathedral? that was ages ago so he definitely was there for that I'm sure I'm sure but he will've missed fun things most definitely
cos he was off for two weeks and then was ill for a week and then was ill for a week
so 's had loads of ill people for ages in that t
no she's not been ill and her husband hasn't been ill thank goodness but they haven't had a lot of fun but yeah but you've got your cough but apart from that touch wood
why are you saying touch wood?
cos that's what people do er they were s discussing that this morning weren't we as superstition?
don't do that because you're i effecting this
yeah but you're banging it and you don't need to bang it
mama? finished please may I get down?
finished please may I get down?
hang on yeah what are we? are you watching a film this evening?
a bad question to ask you know the answer
that isn't a film that's a lload of episodes
I don't know but what I don't want is half of debate between the two of you
we could have a tense debate
no I just want you to make a decision
no I'm just gonna no I'm just gonna put this out there I do think you could cope with the last couple Harry Potter films I really know for a fact don't walk away
I'm not going to do it
come here come here nobody's going to make you
but I'm just saying that you will be fine
I can't hear anything you're saying
alright that's fine okay just find something else then please
come over here what are you thinking of?
leprechauns well we don't have a DVD about leprechauns funnily
Finding Nemo? you saw that recently didn't you?
really recently it's a great film
no you didn't you're just making that up
you don't have to watch a film
I want to watch a film
we want to watch a film
don't do that I mean you could watch just a couple of episodes of something you haven't seen any TV today
come here I just it's cos it's the holidays you could watch a film but
stop it what were? can you remember any of the Netflix films that we looked at
well do you know what ? in terms of Harry Potter
you can see it on your own at some point when is at Brownies
and then if you think it's a suitable er if you know be alright with it then you can watch it again cos you've seen the other ones
like loads of times haven't you?
shall we do that ? cos I havhaven't actually seen those since I saw them at the cinema
I haven't seen them since at all
I like the first three anyway
but we could get a backup in case we don't like Enchanted okay?
hang on hang on hang on a backup in case you don't like?
in case someone doesn't want Enchanted
in case someone doesn't want Enchanted we could watch The Slipper and the Rose
is that when somebody gets killed?
no that is the singing version of Cinderella that I love from when I was little
do you want The Slipper and the Rose?
stop fiddling around with that please
do you want The Slipper and the Rose?
do you want The Slipper and the Rose ?
what sort of film do you want ?
do you want an action film? do you want
do you know what I would like to watch?
it's good but I alright you might find it too scary but you f were fine with The Mummy and then the whatever the third one
I wasn't fine with The Mummy I was scared
oh oh okay well there's nothing wrong with being a little bit scared sometimes
mm no she wasn't what about hotel Transylvania two?
well how come you wouldn't watch that yesterday?
okay so is that for definite? I haven't actually seen
